mutants.original_line: strings = [re.sub(r'[^a-zA-Z\s]', '', string.lower()) for string in strings]
mutants.mutated_line: strings = [re.sub('', '', string.lower()) for string in strings]

mutants.original_line: strings = [re.sub(r'[^a-zA-Z\s]', '', string.lower()) for string in strings]
mutants.mutated_line: strings = [re.sub('[^a-zA-Z\\s]', 'MUTATED', string.lower()) for string in strings]
